ceo_buyer.justification: The buyer is TechGen Metals Limited. The text states: 'TechGen’s Managing Director, Ashley Hood, commented: “The Blue Bore Copper Project is a unique opportunity..."'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: This is an option agreement. The final potential interest upon exercise is 80%. The text states the company has 'an option to acquire an 80% legal and beneficial interest in the Blue Bore Copper Project'.

currency.justification: The option fee is denoted with a '$' symbol ($50,000). The acquiring company, TechGen Metals, is registered in Australia (ABN provided), implying the currency is Australian Dollars.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The only cash consideration is the option fee. 'Grant of the Option is subject to TechGen paying a total of $50,000 cash (plus GST) to the Vendor... The only consideration payable under the Option Agreement is the Option Fee.'

share_payments_raw.justification: The agreement terms do not include any payment in the form of shares from the buyer.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: An explicit cash payment amount is provided, so this field is not applicable per the extraction hierarchy.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: No shares are being issued by the buyer as part of this transaction.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares are being issued by the buyer, so there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The exploration commitment is to drill a 'single drill hole' but 'there is no prescribed minimum depth for the drill hole'. A specific number of meters is not mentioned.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The agreement states TechGen will 'meet all outgoings in respect of the Tenements', but no specific monetary value for an exploration commitment is provided.

exploration_commitment_desc.value: TechGen must complete a single AC or RC drill hole on the tenements before it can exercise its option.
exploration_commitment_desc.justification: A condition precedent for exercising the option is: 'TechGen providing written notice to Vendor that TechGen has completed an AC or RC single drill hole on the Tenements...'

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The seller has the option to convert its remaining 20% interest into a 2% NSR. The text states the Vendor can 'automatically convert its 20% interest in the Assets into a 2% net smelter return royalty over all minerals produced from the Tenements (Royalty)'.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The Project consists of 6 Exploration Licences, EL33313 – EL33318, covering a combined area of 3,950 km2.

coverage_area_unit.justification: The Project consists of 6 Exploration Licences, EL33313 – EL33318, covering a combined area of 3,950 km2.

resource_size_desc.justification: The document describes the project as 'a conceptual copper project located in an unexplored region' and 'has not been previously explored for minerals'. No resource estimate is mentioned.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The document identifies the buyer as 'TechGen Metals Limited' but does not provide a stock ticker symbol (e.g., ASX:TGM) anywhere in the text.
